solution_line_template: The barrel lost {initial_volume} * {percentage_lost} / {divisor_for_percentage} = <<{initial_volume}*{percentage_lost}/{divisor_for_percentage}={liters_lost}>>{liters_lost} liters before anyone noticed.
So, {initial_volume} - {liters_lost} = <<{initial_volume}-{liters_lost}={liters_left}>>{liters_left} liters are left in the barrel.
